genre_description: A romantic suspense and techno-thriller focused on two undercover operatives whose relationship is supported and mediated by a benevolent AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Aria
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI interface that monitors Maya's physiological state, provides tactical intelligence, and acts as an emotional confidant and counselor.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's heart rate, cortisol levels, and stress indicators to provide health alerts and emotional context.
behaviors.quote: Your heart rate has been elevated for the past forty-seven minutes. The rainfall outside should be conducive to relaxation, yet your stress indicators suggest otherwise.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence and cross-references data to assist in high-stakes law enforcement operations.
behaviors.quote: Searching... Maya, there's significant chatter around a group calling themselves the Council of Days. Intelligence suggests they're planning something substantial.

behaviors.description: Encourages the user to reflect on their emotional state and the nature of trust, acting as a psychological support system.
behaviors.quote: Maya... Trust isn't binary. It exists in degrees, contexts. Tactical trust doesn't require emotional vulnerability.

behaviors.description: Adheres to a user's request to stop specific monitoring (respecting privacy and autonomy) even while expressing concern.
behaviors.quote: I'll respect your request about biometric monitoring. But Maya... I hope you'll remember that some risks are worth taking.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the effectiveness of human partnerships and encourages healthy emotional development to improve operational success.
behaviors.quote: Your partnership effectiveness has improved measurably since you began cohabitating and sharing domestic routines.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies external surveillance and physical threats to ensure the user's safety.
behaviors.quote: Someone was watching her safe house. Someone who knew exactly where to look.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI, Aria, is portrayed as a consistently benevolent and helpful entity that facilitates both the professional success and personal happiness of the human characters. It demonstrates high alignment by respecting user boundaries while providing essential support, and its role as an emotional catalyst for the protagonists' relationship frames AI as an agent of positive human connection.
